org.forgerock.openam.scripting

Class ScriptConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.scripting.ScriptConstants

  • public final class ScriptConstants
extends Object
    Constants used for managing scripts.
    Since:
    13.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ScriptConstants.GlobalScript
      Predefined global script configuration IDs.
      static class  ScriptConstants.ScriptContext
      The context in which a script will be used.
      static class  ScriptConstants.ScriptErrorCode
      Error messages are stored in the scripting.properties file to facilitate translation.

    • Method Detail

      • getLanguageFromString

        public static SupportedScriptingLanguage getLanguageFromString(String languageName)
                                                        throws ScriptException
        Retrieve the SupportedScriptingLanguage instance for the given language.
        Parameters:
        languageName - The name of the required scripting language.
        Returns:
        The SupportedScriptingLanguage.
        Throws:
        ScriptException - If the given language is not supported.

      • getContextFromString

        public static ScriptConstants.ScriptContext getContextFromString(String context)
                                                          throws ScriptException
        Retrieve the ScriptContext instance for the given context.
        Parameters:
        context - The name of the required scripting context.
        Returns:
        The ScriptContext.
        Throws:
        ScriptException - If the given context is not supported.
